page.title: 01OUR AREA
page.content: OUR AREA; GRID REFERENCE {02640843,} SHOWS A PREDOMINANCE OF{RESIDENTIAL {HOUSING, BUT ALSO PORTRAYS INDUSTRIAL {DEVELOPMENT, A TOWN CENTRE,HISTORICAL {LANDMARKS AND LAND GIVEN OVER TO {FORESTRY.EIGHTEEN PAGES}HIGHLIGHT AND INFORM ONE ABOUT; ENVIRONS WITHIN THE AREA e.g. EASTGATE SHOPPING CENTRE, LOCAL MEDIA e.g."COURIER", PROVISION OF TYPES OF EDUCATION,PUBLIC SERVICES, e.g.HOSPITALS,RECREATION FACILITIES. PEOPLE ARE SO IMPORTANT TO THE SUCCESS AND DEVELOPMENT OF ANY AREA,HENCE PERSONAL ACCOUNTS e.g. ABOUT HOMELIFE, LEISURE ACTIVITIES ARE INCLUDED WITHIN THIS REPORT. AS ONE READS THE DESCRIPTIONS OF THE VARYING TOPICS IT WILL BECOME CLEAR TO THE READER OF THE TYPE OF AREA WITHIN THIS 4KM BY 3KM BLOCK. C.K. PATERSON (CO-ORDINATOR FOR BLOCK).
